list_definition.definition: a likeness or copy of a person etc made of wood, stone etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Images of the saints adorned the walls.
She’s the very image of her sister.
She looked at her image in the mirror.
I have an image of the place in my mind.

list_definition.definition: the general opinion that people have about a person, company etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A scandal like this is damaging to the company’s public image.

list_ex_of_english: People breathe life into the world and into art's images of it.
